channel.title: I wanted to add 2 portals to my server can anyone help please?
channel.description:
I wanted to add some portals onto my server one was to pkbox and one was to cwars, I want my pkbox portal (zamorak portal) to tele to recipe for disater final battle area pretty sure most of you people heard of it..Any way I kow the coords for it teleportToX = 3363 teleportToY = 3301 but I not sure what the exact code and case for it is or where to put it, And I wanted one portal to go into the cwars game (guthix portal)(I wanted to add fully worknig cwars game to my server) I have an edited a pic on ms paint t oshow you where I want them if anyne will help rep++ will be rewarded thanks :D
[IMG]http://i180.photobucket.com/albums/x303/mystickid2k6/Myeditedpicsofportals.jpg[/img]

item.title: I wanted to add 2 portals to my server can anyone help please?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

sinler range:

Look for a cwars tut and use the code for portels and just change coords for tele

Look at the date before posting next time.

Read full topic
